data.title: Simplicity is beauty
data.text: Had a very nice experience with is Inn, very comfy bed and affordable room prices, staffs are friendly and the establishment itself is very near to other food hubs. The hallway is always clean, breakfast is also good. Check in is very fast and simple.

data.title: Decent for the money
data.text: It looks like this motel was refurbished recently and they did a pretty good job changing the superficial things like paint, wall paper and artwork.  However, it still has that kind of old feel to it.  The hot breakfast was nice and the service was fine.  I like the food at the "Friends" restaurant next door-they make good sandwiches and the soup is real good.  I'd say for the money, this is a pretty good deal.

data.title: Best Place In Missoula
data.text: The people are so friendly. Comfortable rooms. Close to Downtown! I couldn't believe the great free hot breakfast in the morning, not your average fare. I would highly recommend this place!!
